item.title: CI on Github for Python
item.description: So I finally thought it was time to start doing some continuous intergration testing as well as testing with multiple versions of Python. I had been looking at using things such as CircleCI or Travis-ci. But I finally decided I would try to use Github’s workflow actions. I did some searching and found some guides. As part of that I evenutally came a cross this link on Github’s own docs.
